meanings.definition: To embody together with another or others.
meanings.sent1: The friends were coembodying their dance moves at the party.
meanings.sent2: The actors coembodying their characters on stage received a standing ovation.
meanings.sent3: The siblings coembodying a synchronized swimming routine made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The music and lyrics coembodying perfectly in the singer's performance.
meanings.sent5: The unity and harmony of the choir coembodying in their beautiful song.

meanings.definition: To represent or express in a physical form.
meanings.sent1: The artist was coembodying her emotions through her painting.
meanings.sent2: The sculpture coembodying a powerful message stood in the center of the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorator coembodying a unicorn in frosting amazed the party guests.
meanings.sent4: The sunset coembodying the end of a perfect day.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's movements coembodying grace and strength captivated the audience.
